item.description:
Come dance the night away with old friends and new at the Crowne Plaza in Natick.

Drinks start at 6:00 PM.
Dinner starts at 7:00 PM.
Dancing starts at 8:30 PM to the tunes of Boston Partymakers.

Pricing
Dinner & Dance - $45 if paid in full by Wednesday, 12/31/08
Dinner & Dance - $50 if paid in full by Saturday, 01/10/09
Dance Only - $15 if paid in full by Wednesday, 12/31/08
Dance Only, at the door - $20

Check our website for the event flier containing full details: BBTC Dinner/Dance

Last year we had approximately 35 people for dinner, with an additional 10 - 20 coming in for the dance only. Let's make it an even bigger event this year!
item.how_to_find_us: Check the hotel's function board to find out which room we're in.
item.name: Boston Beanstalks Tall Club 26th Anniversary Dinner & Dance
